content.raw:
Do I need to manually install the new packages even though they're specified on `package.xml`? I've cleaned my workspace and rebuilt but I get errors at runtime:

~~~
Could not load controller 'hands_joint_state_controller' because controller type 'joint_state_c
ontroller/JointStateController' does not exist.
~~~ 

If that's the case, I'm not sure where in the instructions that would be described.
content.html:
